it.polimi.se2018.server.controller

Class PointsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.server.controller.PointsManager

  • class PointsManager
extends java.lang.Object
    class PointsManager: class used to calculate the final points of players at the end of the game in both of two mode(multi player and single player)
    Author:
    fadda-miceli-mundo
